DOC.brief_summary: This Phase IB , open-label , dose-finding study JAK 1 2 inhibitor ruxolitinib patient myelofibrosis ( MF ) . The study consist two period : core study period , comprise dose escalation stage safety extension phase Week 24 , extension study period beyond Week 24 3 year , characterize safety efficacy ruxolitinib patient population . The dose escalation phase enroll successive cohort patient receive increase dos ruxolitinib maximum safe start dose ( MSSD ) determine . In safety expansion phase , additional patient treat ruxolitinib MSSD define dose escalation . The primary objective establish MSSD ruxolitinib patient MF start platelet count < 100 x 10 ^9/L
DOC.brief_title: Study JAK Inhibitor Ruxolitinib Administered Orally Patients With Primary Myelofibrosis ( PMF ) , Post-Polycythemia Vera-Myelofibrosis ( PPV-MF ) Post-Essential Thrombocythemia-Myelofibrosis ( PET-MF )
DOC.criteria: Require treatment MF classify least intermediate risk level 1 define International Working Group . Platelet count < 100x10 ^9/L screen Study Day 1 . Received platelet transfusion within 14 day prior Screening evaluation .
